text: Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Kru muvɨra krunavundiŋ kuyusɨhɨrɨtɨrɨŋ arɨŋandɨ ñɨmbi tɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨyu vata andɨndu. Kamata krunavundirɨm nɨŋɨnɨŋ ñaña itɨhañata kɨndayu vɨrɨmandɨyu vata kru kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ kɨpumɨka ñambayɨ tɨhɨrandu. Hara narɨ ñaña itɨhañata ŋgata kru nɨŋɨnɨŋ andɨndu maña kɨpumɨka ñambayɨ mandɨhɨramara. Narɨŋ yi kandɨ ambin, kru kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋɨndu ñɨmbi krunavundi tɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨyu. Hara Got mandɨhuyahɨrɨmandɨ.
